item.title: Pump.fun has released the Dynamic Fee V1 update, where the creator fee will be tiered by market cap.
item.description: On September 3rd, Pump.fun, the token launchpad within the Solana ecosystem, announced the Dynamic Fee V1 update. The creator fee for tokens will now be tiered according to market capitalization. This implies that the higher the token's market capitalization, the lower the percentage of the creator fee. This fee structure is applicable to all PumpSwap tokens, whether they are old or new. The Pump.fun protocol fees and the fees that are automatically compounded to liquidity providers (including burned LPs) remain unchanged from before.

item.title: SharpLink CEO: Ethereum is the Wall Street of Capital, combining Productivity, Profitability, and Programmability
item.description: On September 3rd, Joseph Chalom, the Co-CEO of SharpLink which is the second-largest treasury company in Ethereum, published an article to explain why ETH is favored by Wall Street capital. He stated that Ethereum is the place where capital wants to go. With 10 years of continuous operation, it ensures the storage of trillions of dollars in value. At the same time, the new foundation leadership is making significant progress at the L1 level. Therefore, SharpLink is very optimistic about the entire Ethereum ecosystem, including L1 and L2, believing that it will attract capital attention. Since Ethereum on-chain transactions are secure and ongoing, SharpLink believes that ETH is a high-quality treasury asset - the world's first truly trusted commodity with productivity, profitability, programmability and is rapidly becoming a core institutional digital asset.

item.title: Venus Initiates Emergency Vote: Security Recovery Protocol and User Funds Recoupment
item.description: September 3rd: In response to a security incident where users fell victim to a phishing attack, the Venus Protocol has released an emergency vote. This has prompted the protocol to quickly pause in order to protect asset safety. The team has proposed a partial protocol recovery to adjust positions and prevent liquidation. Additionally, a forced liquidation of the attacker's wallet is also part of the plan. The protocol will be fully restored once the security review is completed.The vote encompasses:- Partial recovery of the Venus Protocol within 5 hours (allowing for debt repayment/supply of funds);- Recovery of stolen funds within 7 hours;- Security review of Venus within 24 hours to prevent any other users from experiencing similar attacks.Full recovery of Venus - Updates and timelines will be announced separately.

item.title: Coinbase International Site to List ZEN, UMA, and GMX Perpetual Contracts
item.description: On September 3rd, Coinbase International is set to list ZEN, UMA, and GMX perpetual contracts. The markets for ZEN-PERP, UMA-PERP, and GMX-PERP will commence on September 4, 2025, at 9:30 AM (UTC) or thereafter.

item.title: Linea has announced the launch of the Ignition Liquidity Incentive Program, distributing 1 billion LINEA tokens as rewards.
item.description: On September 2nd, Linea officially made an announcement regarding the launch of the Linea Ignition liquidity incentive program, which is open to the entire community. The program is designed to expedite the growth of active TVL on Linea, provide rewards to liquidity providers, and Power Linea is also scheduled to introduce the Native Yield feature.The Linea Ignition liquidity incentive program will allocate 1 billion LINEA tokens as incentives, and the end date of the program is October 26, 2025.

item.title: 「Big Brother Whale」 Huang Licheng Increases ETH Holdings by 1400 Coins, Liquidation Price $3321
item.description: On September 2nd, as per the monitoring of HyperInsight, "Big Brother Whale" Huang Licheng saw a significant increase in his position by 1400 ETH. His holding size now exceeds $130 million. Currently, he is facing an unrealized loss of $3.63 million, and the liquidation price is $3321.

item.title: A whale closed a PUMP long position, realizing a $1.78 million profit
item.description: On September 2nd, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, whale @ParallelAiRev has just concluded a PUMP long position and reaped a profit of $1.78 million. This brings the total profit from PUMP trading to $3.37 million.

item.title: Midday Sell-Off in US Stocks Deepens, SharpLink Tumbles Over 5%
item.description: On September 2nd, based on market data, the US stock market witnessed a further downturn during the trading period. The Nasdaq declined by 1.6%, the Dow Jones dropped by 1.02%, and the S&P 500 Index fell by 1.32%. Cryptocurrency-related stocks generally saw a decrease, including:WLFI Treasury Company's ALT5 Sigma (ALTS) saw a sharp plunge of 28.3%. On August 11th, it announced the launch of a $1.5 billion private placement for WLFI Treasury Strategic Initiative, with Eric Trump, the son of former President Donald Trump, joining the board;Bitmine (BMNR) fell by 0.76;SharpLink Gaming (SBET) dropped by 5%;Circle (CRCL) declined by 7.2%;Strategy (MSTR) went against the trend and rose by 3%.

item.title: Pro Trader @ParallelAiRev Nets Another $1.78M, Tops $PUMP Leaderboard Again
item.description: Whale investor @ParallelAiRev created a new account to trade $PUMP, once again becoming the most profitable $PUMP trader on the weekly leaderboard. He just closed his $PUMP long, realizing another $1.78M in profit. He has earned a total of $3.37M on the $PUMP.

item.title: Key Transaction Data: Federal Reserve Losing Rate Control, 30-Year Treasury Yield Rises to 5%
item.description: September 2nd: The Kobeissi Letter released its latest market analysis indicating that the Federal Reserve will implement the first interest rate cut in 2025 within 15 days. However, the 30-year U.S. Treasury bond yield is currently approaching 5.00%. As the market absorbs the impact of the Fed's rate cut, interest rates are on the rise. Currently, there is a 90% chance of a 25-basis-point rate cut by the Federal Reserve on September 17th. The market anticipates a 50-basis-point rate cut in 2025, and the likelihood of a total of 75 basis points in rate cuts this year is as high as 34%.Nevertheless, today the U.S. Treasury bond yield has soared, with the 30-year Treasury bond yield rising to 5%, a level equivalent to that during the largest financial crisis in U.S. history in 2008. While the market is gearing up for rate cuts, interest rates are actually increasing. The U.S. deficit spending is out of control, and the Federal Reserve is losing its grip on interest rates, issuing more
